name: Neoxena
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, is the window open?”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can control your Neoxena devices, like gate controllers, switches, etc.
You can monitor your sensors like contact sensor, etc.
You can create routines.
You need Neoxena app installed and linking Your account with Amazon Alexa together.
